metadata.title: CVE-2024-3372 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Improper validation of certain metadata input may result in the server notcorrectly serialising BSON. This can be performed pre-authentication andmay cause unexpected application behavior including unavailability ofserverStatus responses. This issue affects MongoDB Server v7.0 versionsprior to 7.0.6, MongoDB Server v6.0 versions prior to 6.0.14 and MongoDBServer v.5.0 versions prior to 5.0.25.

criterions.comment: mongodb package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
